about_us.title: About Us
about_us.description: We are dedicated to bringing musicians and their audiences closer together by providing an interactive platform that makes live music experiences more engaging. Our mission is to help bands create unforgettable moments by letting the audience participate and choose their favorite songs in real-time.
terms_content.section_1_body: By accessing this platform and using our services, you accept and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use our platform.
terms_content.section_2_body: This platform allows music bands to create playlists for events and let audiences vote for their favorite songs from these lists. Users can vote anonymously.
terms_content.section_3_body: Users agree not to share false, misleading, or illegal content on the platform. Users are responsible for keeping band information and passwords confidential. Unauthorized use of passwords is the user's responsibility.
terms_content.section_4_body: User information is processed as stated in our Privacy Policy. Passwords and personal information are not shared with third parties.
terms_content.section_5_body: Some services on the platform may be paid. Pricing and payment terms are specified in the descriptions of the respective plans. Payments may not be refunded in the event of cancellation of paid services.
terms_content.section_6_body: All content and software on the platform are owned by the platform or its licensors. Unauthorized copying or reproduction is prohibited.
terms_content.section_7_body: The platform reserves the right to modify or discontinue any service without prior notice.
terms_content.section_8_body: The platform does not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free services. Users accept that the platform will not be held liable for any losses due to technical disruptions.
terms_content.section_9_body: The platform may contain links to third-party websites. No responsibility is assumed for the content or privacy practices of these sites.
terms_content.section_10_body: The platform reserves the right to make changes to these terms and conditions. Changes will be effective as soon as they are posted on the platform. Users are deemed to accept the updated terms by continuing to use the services.
terms_content.section_11_body: If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at support@votesong.live.
